description: Organize tasks and subtasks with fast create, update, complete, and reopen actions. Filter views by today, upcoming, overdue, or all to stay focused. Recover mistakes with soft delete and restore.

todoApiBaseUrl.description: Base URL of Todo API server

todoApiAccessToken.description: Access token for Todo API authentication

capabilities.name: list_tasks
capabilities.description: List tasks with optional filters (today, upcoming, overdue, all)

capabilities.name: create_task
capabilities.description: Create a new task, generating subtasks created by AI

capabilities.name: update_task
capabilities.description: Update an existing task. All fields except taskId are optional.

capabilities.name: complete_task
capabilities.description: Mark a task as completed (automatically completes all subtasks)

capabilities.name: create_subtask
capabilities.description: Create a new subtask under a specified task
